description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. If there's not DIRT in your beer, you ain't at a real race! Welcome to DIRT TRACK RACER, an incredible racing game where you fight it out on track against 40 opponents. Brought to you by Maximinus.
